IS_EMAIL: {property} must be a valid email format.
MIN: {property} must be equal or bigger than {constraint}.
MAX: {property} must be equal or lesser than {constraint}.
IS_DATE: {property} must be a date in format 'yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.mmmZ' and a valid date.
IS_DATE_STRING: {property} must be a date in format 'yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.mmmZ' and a valid date.
IS_TIME: {property} must be a valid time in format 'hh:mm:ss'
IS_VALID_TOKEN: {property} must be a valid token type 'refresh Token'
ARRAY_UNIQUE: {property} must be an array with unique values.
ARRAY_MIN: {property} must be an array with at least {constraint} elements.
